memberdef.name: AMREX_CUDA_LAUNCH_HOST_DEVICE_LAMBDA_BOXIV
memberdef.initializer: { \ long amrex_i_npts = BX.numPts(); \ for (auto const amrex_i_i : amrex::Cuda::Range(amrex_i_npts)) { \ const auto IV = BX.atOffset(amrex_i_i); \ block \ } \ }

memberdef.name: AMREX_CUDA_FOR_3D_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: { \ const auto amrex_i_lo = amrex::lbound(box); \ const auto amrex_i_hi = amrex::ubound(box); \ for (int k = amrex_i_lo.z; k <= amrex_i_hi.z; ++k) { \ for (int j = amrex_i_lo.y; j <= amrex_i_hi.y; ++j) { \ for (int i = amrex_i_lo.x; i <= amrex_i_hi.x; ++i) { \ block \ }}} \ }

memberdef.name: AMREX_CUDA_FOR_4D_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: { \ const auto amrex_i_lo = amrex::lbound(box); \ const auto amrex_i_hi = amrex::ubound(box); \ for (int n = 0; n < ncomp; ++n) { \ for (int k = amrex_i_lo.z; k <= amrex_i_hi.z; ++k) { \ for (int j = amrex_i_lo.y; j <= amrex_i_hi.y; ++j) { \ for (int i = amrex_i_lo.x; i <= amrex_i_hi.x; ++i) { \ block \ }}}} \ }
